text: On 21 February 2025 at around 20:40 (PET), parts of the roof of the Real Plaza Trujillo shopping center in Trujillo, Peru collapsed, causing eight people to die including children. It also left 84 people injured. The collapse mainly affected the mall's food court area and children's play section. ==References== Category:February 2025 events
title: Real Plaza Trujillo roof collapse
